originalText.text: Roman is incredibly meticulous, as well as the rest of the crew from On Target Chimney Cleaning. I had three workers here in New York really excelling and they did a fantastic job with the final result. My chimney looks even better now than it did before they started! I couldn’t have requested better chimney sweep service, more professional individuals, or greater personalities! Cory, Ezekiel, and the rest of the team were simply outstanding!

originalText.text: Ezekiel arrived to perform a chimney inspection. He was skilled and informative. Ezekiel answered all of my questions and assisted me in understanding my options. He was honest and thoughtful, making it easy to select the team from On Target Chimney Cleaning in New York. Don't hesitate to give them a call!

originalText.text: Amazing customer service. Inspection took 45-60 min with a thorough report that was easily understandable at the end. Techs were and made me feel like our safety was their top concern. Will definitely use them in the future and endorse to friends and neighbors!

originalText.text: Douglas was on time, sent a message with an , courteous, professional and did a wonderful work cleaning and inspecting my fireplace as well as helped me replace a flex line and remove the ugly screens. Placed a tarp to protect the floor as well as wore boot coverings. I will keep them in mind for next and recommendations.
